title: Les Miserables (TV Version)
abstract: Note: Based on 'Les Miserables' by Victor Hugo.
description: Imprisoned for stealing a loaf of bread, Jean Valjean's life is transformed by an act of forgiveness. He becomes the respected mayor of the poor town of Vigau and transforms it into a thriving community. He also falls in love with one of Vigau's most pitiful, poverty-stricken residents, the beautiful Fantine, and devotes himself to her care.  Credits: Director, Marcel Bluwal ; writer, Marcel Bluwal ; photography, Andre Bac. Cast: Bernard Fresson, Micha Bayard, Georges Geret, Nicole Jamet, Francois Marthouret, Alain Mottet.
